context: Hi, what movies do you like?
I like pretty much anything but horror! Anything recent that you have seen?
Sure, I've seen the new Avengers: Infinity War (2018) and Lady Bird (2017) and RBG (2018) which is an indie documentary about Ruth Bader Ginsberg. I'd recommend all of them.
Ive seen them all but Lady Bird (2017) Are you a marvel fan
resp: Not really. Isle Of Dogs (2018) was good also.
